General.Name: Center International Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Center International Group Co.,Ltd. provides building metal enclosure systems solutions in China. It also provides building integrated photovoltaic and environmental protection comprehensive treatment. It undertakes various industrial projects, including automobile, machinery, electrical and electronic, chemical and metallurgical, food and pharmaceutical, logistics, power plant, commercial office, and public building. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 20, BDA Intl. Enterprise Avenue, Beijing, China, 100176
